dynamic.isNotNull: db.[id_kcsp]!=(select id_kcsp from tb_shopsp where id=#not_id_id_kcsp# )
exists(select 1 from Tb_spfl as spfl where spfl.id = #id_spfl# and fl.path+'/' like spfl.path+'/%' )
( db.mc like #keyword# or db.zjm like #keyword# or db.bm like #keyword# or db.barcode like #keyword# or db.bz like #keyword# )
db.id_kcsp in ( select id_kcsp from tb_shopsp c where id=#select_id_sp# )
exists(select 1 from tb_shopsp where id_masteruser=#id_masteruser# and id_shop=$id_shop_ck$ and id_sp=db.id_sp and flag_delete=0 and flag_state=1 )
db.id_kcsp in ( select id_kcsp from tb_shopsp c where id=#select_id_sp_wd# )

statements.sql: set transaction isolation level read uncommitted
statements.select:
set nocount on
select db.[id_masteruser],db.[id],db.[id_shop],db.[id_sp],db.[dw],db.[id_kcsp],db.[bm],db.[mc],db.[id_spfl],db.[barcode],db.[zjm],db.[zhl],db.[cd],db.[flag_state],db.[flag_czfs],db.[dj_ls],db.[dj_jh],db.[sl_kc_min],db.[sl_kc_max],db.[bz],db.[pic_path],db.[id_create],db.[rq_create],db.[id_edit],db.[rq_edit],db.[flag_delete],db.dj_hy ,db.id_gys ,db.dj_ps ,db.dj_pf ,db.yxq from as db left join tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl

set nocount on
select t.* from (select row_number() over() as rownumber,db.[bm],db.[mc],db.[barcode],db.[dj_jh],db.[dj_ls],db.[dw],db.[id] from as db ) as t

set nocount on
select count(1) as value from as db left join tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl left join tb_shop shop on shop.id=db.id_shop left join tz_sp_kc kc on kc.id_kcsp=db.id_kcsp and kc.id_shop=db.[id_shop] and kc.id_masteruser=db.id_masteruser

set nocount on
select count(1) as value from as db left join tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl left join tb_shop shop on shop.id=db.id_shop

set nocount on
select db.[id_masteruser],db.[id],db.[id_shop],db.[id_sp],db.[dw],db.[id_kcsp],db.[bm],db.[mc],db.[id_spfl],db.[barcode],db.[zjm],db.[zhl],db.[cd],db.[flag_state],db.[flag_czfs],db.[dj_ls],db.[dj_jh],db.[sl_kc_min],db.[sl_kc_max],db.[bz],db.[pic_path],db.[id_create],db.[rq_create],db.[id_edit],db.[rq_edit],db.[flag_delete],db.dj_hy ,db.id_gys ,db.dj_ps ,db.dj_pf ,db.yxq ,gys.mc name_gys from as db left join tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl left join tb_gys gys on gys.id=db.id_gys

set nocount on
select db.[id_masteruser],db.[id],db.[id_shop],db.[id_sp],db.[dw],db.[id_kcsp],db.[bm],db.[mc],db.[id_spfl],db.[barcode],db.[zjm],db.[zhl],db.[cd],db.[flag_state],db.[flag_czfs],db.[dj_ls],db.[dj_jh],db.[sl_kc_min],db.[sl_kc_max],db.[bz],db.[pic_path],db.[id_create],db.[rq_create],db.[id_edit],db.[rq_edit],db.[flag_delete],db.dj_hy ,db.id_gys ,db.dj_ps ,db.dj_pf ,db.yxq ,( SELECT isnull(SUM(sl_qm),0) sl_qm FROM ( SELECT id_kcsp id_shopsp,isnull(sl_qm,0) sl_qm FROM tz_sp_kc WHERE id_shop=db.id_shop and id_kcsp=db.id_kcsp UNION ALL SELECT l2.id_kcsp id_shopsp,(-1)*isnull(sl_total,0) sl_qm FROM td_ls_2 l2 left join td_ls_1 l1 on l2.id_bill=l1.id WHERE l2.id_kcsp=db.id_kcsp and l1.id_shop=db.id_shop and not exists(select 1 from td_ls_2c c2 where c2.id=l2.id) ) AS Tmp GROUP BY id_shopsp ) sl_qm ,isnull(kc.je_qm,0) je_qm ,isnull(kc.dj_cb,0) dj_cb from as db left join tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl left join tz_sp_kc kc on kc.id_kcsp=db.id_kcsp and kc.id_shop=db.[id_shop] and kc.id_masteruser=db.id_masteruser

set nocount on
select db.[id_masteruser],db.[id],db.[id_shop],db.[id_sp],db.[dw],db.[id_kcsp],db.[bm],db.[mc],db.[id_spfl],db.[barcode],db.[zjm],db.[zhl],db.[cd],db.[flag_state],db.[flag_czfs],db.[dj_ls],db.[dj_jh],db.[sl_kc_min],db.[sl_kc_max],db.[bz],db.[pic_path],db.[id_create],db.[rq_create],db.[id_edit],db.[rq_edit],db.[flag_delete],db.dj_hy ,db.id_gys ,db.dj_ps ,db.dj_pf ,db.yxq ,( SELECT isnull(SUM(sl_qm),0) sl_qm FROM ( SELECT id_kcsp id_shopsp,isnull(sl_qm,0) sl_qm FROM tz_sp_kc WHERE id_shop=db.id_shop and id_kcsp=db.id_kcsp UNION ALL SELECT l2.id_kcsp id_shopsp,(-1)*isnull(sl_total,0) sl_qm FROM td_ls_2 l2 left join td_ls_1 l1 on l2.id_bill=l1.id WHERE l2.id_kcsp=db.id_kcsp and l1.id_shop=db.id_shop and not exists(select 1 from td_ls_2c c2 where c2.id=l2.id) ) AS Tmp GROUP BY id_shopsp ) sl_qm ,isnull(kc.je_qm,0) je_qm ,isnull(kc.dj_cb,0) dj_cb ,(select id from tb_shopsp where id_masteruser=#id_masteruser# and flag_state=1 and flag_delete=0 and id_shop=$id_shop_ck$ and id_sp=db.id_sp) id_shopsp_ck ,(select id_kcsp from tb_shopsp where id_masteruser=#id_masteruser# and flag_state=1 and flag_delete=0 and id_shop=$id_shop_ck$ and id_sp=db.id_sp) id_kcsp_ck from as db left join tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl left join tz_sp_kc kc on kc.id_kcsp=db.id_kcsp and kc.id_shop=db.[id_shop] and kc.id_masteruser=db.id_masteruser
select isnull(MAX(LEFT(barcode,7)),0)+0 FROM tb_shopsp where 1=1 and id_masteruser=#id_masteruser# and LEFT(barcode,2)=#dh_cz# and ISNUMERIC(LEFT(barcode,7))=1

set nocount on
select db.[id_masteruser],db.[id],db.[id_shop],db.[id_sp],db.[dw],db.[id_kcsp],db.[bm],db.[mc],db.[id_spfl],db.[barcode],db.[zjm],db.[zhl],db.[cd],db.[flag_state],db.[flag_czfs],db.[dj_ls],db.[dj_jh],db.[sl_kc_min],db.[sl_kc_max],db.[bz],db.[pic_path],db.[id_create],db.[rq_create],db.[id_edit],db.[rq_edit],db.[flag_delete],db.dj_hy ,db.id_gys ,db.dj_ps ,db.dj_pf ,db.yxq ,isnull(kc.sl_qm,0) sl_qm ,isnull(kc.je_qm,0) je_qm ,isnull(kc.dj_cb,0) dj_cb from as db left join tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl left join tz_sp_kc kc on kc.id_kcsp=db.id_kcsp and kc.id_shop=db.[id_shop] and kc.id_masteruser=db.id_masteruser
